history.title: skycity casino adelaide
history.description2: Adelaide Casino, or SkyCity Adelaide, is a vibrant hub where excitement meets elegance. Known for its dynamic atmosphere, it offers guests a unique blend of world-class gaming, fine dining, and luxury accommodation. Whether you’re seeking thrilling entertainment or a sophisticated escape, this destination delivers an unforgettable experience in the heart of Adelaide.

customHtml.title: About skycity casino adelaide
customHtml.description:
Adelaide Casino, known as SkyCity Adelaide, is the heart of gaming entertainment in South Australia. Every guest here is immersed in an atmosphere of premium service and modern comfort. The casino offers more than ninety table games and over nine hundred gaming machines, including progressive jackpots.


The most popular game is baccarat, which has its own dedicated Baccarat Pavilion. Fans of blackjack and roulette will find both classic and innovative versions, while poker enthusiasts will appreciate the spacious poker room, one of the largest in the country. For those who prefer fast-paced action, Rapid Roulette and electronic versions of popular games are available.


Entertainment at SkyCity Adelaide goes far beyond the casino floor. Guests can indulge in culinary experiences at premium restaurants serving Australian and international cuisine, or spend the evening in stylish bars with panoramic city views. The atmosphere is complemented by modern art installations and comfortable lounge areas, creating the perfect setting for social gatherings and events.


A special highlight of the complex is the EOS by SkyCity hotel — a true embodiment of luxury and personalized service. Every detail is designed for maximum comfort: spacious rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows, designer furniture, smart lighting systems, and exclusive amenities. Guests can unwind in the spa area with massage rooms, sauna, and steam room, enjoy the outdoor pool overlooking the River Torrens, or work out in the state-of-the-art fitness center.


The hotel features five restaurants, including Sol Bar with stunning views of North Adelaide, as well as unique spaces for weddings, conferences, and private events. Thanks to its central location, EOS by SkyCity is the perfect starting point for exploring the culture, cuisine, and natural beauty of South Australia.


Rules for Visiting Adelaide Casino

Adelaide Casino is South Australia’s leading entertainment destination, offering a safe and comfortable environment for all guests. To make your visit enjoyable and hassle-free, please review the following guidelines.


Age Requirements

  • • Entry is allowed only for guests aged 18 and over.
  • • A valid photo ID (passport, driver’s license, or official identification) must be presented upon entry.

Dress Code

The standard is smart casual.

  • For men: collared shirts or polos, trousers or clean jeans, closed shoes.
  • For women: elegant casual wear, dresses, blouses, and appropriate footwear.

Opening Hours

  • Gaming machines: daily from 10:00 AM to 4:00 AM (Friday and Saturday until 5:00 AM).
  • Table games: from 12:00 PM to 4:00 AM.

Additional Rules

  • • Entry is prohibited for anyone under the influence of drugs or excessive alcohol.
  • • Photography and video recording in gaming areas are restricted.
  • • Smoking is allowed only in designated areas.
  • • Management reserves the right to refuse entry for rule violations.

SkyCity Rewards: Adelaide Casino Loyalty Program

SkyCity Rewards is the exclusive loyalty program at Adelaide Casino, designed for guests who value benefits and personalized experiences. Membership unlocks access to rewards, discounts, and special offers that make every visit more rewarding.


Members receive a personal card to earn points when playing gaming machines, table games, or paying for dining and accommodation at EOS by SkyCity. The more you play and enjoy the services, the more points and perks you collect.


Earning and Redeeming Points

  • • Gaming machines and table games earn points based on play.
  • • Dining and hotel stays also earn points: $1 = 1 point.
  • • 100 points = $1, redeemable for food, drinks, accommodation, or gaming.

Membership Levels

SkyCity Rewards offers five tiers: Premier, Star, Superstar, Icon, Legend. Higher levels unlock greater benefits, including VIP lounge access, exclusive promotions, personalized offers, and priority service.

customHtml_2.title: Adelaide Casino Guide
customHtml_2.description:
Adelaide Casino Promotions


Welcome Bonus at Adelaide Casino

  • • Up to 100 free spins on popular slots.
  • • First deposit bonus — up to 100% when you deposit from $20.

Weekly Cashback

  • • Cashback amount: from 5% to 15%.
  • • Payout: every Monday.


Promotions for Regular Players

  • • Happy Hours — double reward points.
  • • Prize tournaments.
  • • Birthday bonuses.

VIP Program and Loyalty System

  • • The SkyCity Rewards program includes 5 levels.
  • • Cashback up to 15%.
  • • Personal manager.
  • • Exclusive gifts and events.

Popular Games

Adelaide Casino offers more than 950 slot machines and around 90–200 tables for classic games:


Slot Machines (Pokies)

  • • Over 950 machines, including progressive jackpots (Fort Knox with prizes up to six figures).
  • • Popular slots: Dolly Parton, Indian Dreaming, Ghost Busters, Black Rose, Lucky Star.

Table Games

  • • Blackjack (including Free Bet Blackjack and Pontoon)
  • • Roulette (Vegas Star, Rapid Roulette)
  • • Baccarat (with a dedicated Baccarat Pavilion)
  • • Caribbean Stud Poker, Casino War, Sic Bo, Texas Hold’em Bonus
  • • Big Wheel — payouts up to 45:1, automated version Lucky Big Wheel — up to 52:1.

Poker

One of the largest poker areas in Australia, plus sports betting (TAB and Sportbets).


Minimum and Maximum Bets at Adelaide Casino

Adelaide Casino offers flexible betting limits suitable for both beginners and high rollers. Below is an overview of typical minimum and maximum stakes by game type:


Game Type Minimum Bet Maximum Bet
Slot Machines (Pokies) $0.01 – $1 AUD $5 – $10 AUD
Roulette $2 – $5 AUD Up to $1,000 AUD
Blackjack $10 AUD Up to $1,000 AUD
Baccarat $20 AUD Up to $10,000 AUD (VIP)
Poker (Cash Games) $50 AUD buy-in Varies by table

Entertainment and Events

Adelaide Casino is not just about gaming — it’s also an entertainment hub with restaurants, bars, and live shows:


Restaurants and Bars

  • • Madame Hanoi (Vietnamese cuisine)
  • • Sean’s Kitchen (modern Australian cuisine)
  • • Chandelier Bar for cocktails

Live Music and Parties

  • • The District at SkyCity — a venue for concerts, DJ sets, and themed parties.

Seasonal Promotions and Tournaments

  • • Poker tournaments
  • • Themed nights
  • • Food festivals

VIP Areas

  • • Private events for SkyCity Rewards members
  • • Personal hosts
  • • Exclusive tastings

items.title: What payment methods are available at Adelaide Casino?
items.answer: You can use cash, debit and credit cards, as well as some electronic payment systems. Check available options at the guest service desk.

items.title: Is smoking allowed in the casino?
items.answer: Smoking is permitted only in designated areas. It is strictly prohibited in gaming zones.

items.title: Does the casino offer parking for guests?
items.answer: Yes, Adelaide Casino provides parking, including VIP spaces. Discounts may be available for loyalty program members.

items.title: Is the casino open on public holidays?
items.answer: Yes, Adelaide Casino is open 24/7, including all public holidays.

items.title: Does the casino offer free drinks or food?
items.answer: In gaming areas, drinks may be complimentary for active players. Restaurants and bars with diverse menus are also available.
